item.title: [j22] Brood Monitor
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Drone

Devoid (This card has no color.)

When Brood Monitor enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

item.title: [j22] Broken Bond
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [j22] Bristling Boar
item.description:
Creature — Boar

Bristling Boar can't be blocked by more than one creature.

item.title: [j22] Bring to Trial
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

item.title: [j22] Brineborn Cutthroat
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Pirate

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Brineborn Cutthroat.

item.title: [j22] Brightmare
item.description:
Creature — Unicorn

When Brightmare enters the battlefield, tap up to one target creature. You gain life equal to that creature's power.

item.title: [j22] Briarpack Alpha
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

When Briarpack Alpha enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Brazen Wolves
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Whenever Brazen Wolves attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Brazen Freebooter
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Brazen Freebooter enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [j22] Bounding Wolf
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Flash

Reach

item.title: [j22] Borderland Marauder
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Bone Picker
item.description:
Creature — Bird

This spell costs {3} less to cast if a creature died this turn.

Flying, deathtouch

item.title: [j22] Bonders' Enclave
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{3}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

item.title: [j22] Bolt Hound
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Dog

Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

Whenever Bolt Hound attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Bogardan Dragonheart
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

Sacrifice another creature: Until end of turn, Bogardan Dragonheart becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4, flying, and haste.

item.title: [j22] Bloodtracker
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Wizard

Flying

{B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodtracker.

When Bloodtracker leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [j22] Bloodthirsty Aerialist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Rogue

Flying

Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodthirsty Aerialist.

item.title: [j22] Blood Price
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [j22] Bloodline Pretender
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Shapeshifter

Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

As Bloodline Pretender enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Whenever another creature of the chosen type enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodline Pretender.

item.title: [j22] Bloodhaze Wolverine
item.description:
Creature — Wolverine

Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Bloodhaze Wolverine gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Bloodbond Vampire
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Shaman Ally

Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbond Vampire.

item.title: [j22] Blood Aspirant
item.description:
Creature — Satyr Berserker

Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Aspirant.

{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or enchantment: Blood Aspirant deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.

item.title: [j22] Blisterspit Gremlin
item.description:
Creature — Gremlin

{1}, {T}: Blisterspit Gremlin deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Blisterspit Gremlin.

item.title: [j22] Blisterpod
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Drone

Devoid (This card has no color.)

When Blisterpod dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

item.title: [j22] Blight Keeper
item.description:
Creature — Bat Imp

Flying

{7}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blight Keeper: Target opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

item.title: [j22] Blighted Fen
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Fen: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [j22] Blessed Spirits
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Blessed Spirits.

item.title: [j22] Blessed Sanctuary
item.description:
Enchantment

Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control.

Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Unicorn creature token.

item.title: [j22] Blessed Defiance
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [j22] Blaze
item.description:
Sorcery

Blaze deals X damage to any target.

item.title: [j22] Black Cat
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Cat

When Black Cat dies, target opponent discards a card at random.

item.title: [j22] Big Score
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [j22] Berg Strider
item.description:
Snow Creature — Giant Wizard

When Berg Strider enters the battlefield, tap target artifact or creature an opponent controls. If {S} was spent to cast this spell, that permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

item.title: [j22] Benalish Honor Guard
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

Benalish Honor Guard gets +1/+0 for each legendary creature you control.

item.title: [j22] Battle Squadron
item.description:
Creature — Goblin

Flying

Battle Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

item.title: [j22] Basri's Acolyte
item.description:
Creature — Cat Cleric

Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

When Basri's Acolyte enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures you control.

item.title: [j22] Barrin, Tolarian Archmage
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

When Barrin, Tolarian Archmage enters the battlefield, return up to one other target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand.

At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent was put into your hand from the battlefield this turn, draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Barrage Ogre
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Warrior

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Barrage Ogre deals 2 damage to any target.

item.title: [j22] Banefire
item.description:
Sorcery

Banefire deals X damage to any target.

If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

item.title: [j22] Band Together
item.description:
Instant

Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

item.title: [j22] Baloth Woodcrasher
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Baloth Woodcrasher gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Bag of Holding
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.

{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag of Holding: Return all cards exiled with Bag of Holding to their owner's hand.

item.title: [j22] Axgard Cavalry
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Berserker

{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Aviation Pioneer
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

When Aviation Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

item.title: [j22] Avenger of Zendikar
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control.

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

item.title: [j22] Avalanche Caller
item.description:
Snow Creature — Human Wizard

{2}: Target snow land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with hexproof and haste until end of turn. It's still a land. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

item.title: [j22] Auramancer
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [j22] Augury Owl
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.title: [j22] Attended Healer
item.description:
Creature — Kor Cleric

Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 white Cat creature token.

{2}{W}: Another target Cleric gains lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Assembly-Worker
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Assembly-Worker

{T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
